import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import firebase from 'firebase/app'; export class CreatePost extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { content: '', currentSize: 1, email: '', groupSize: '', imageCite: 'https://unsplash.com/s/photos/study', imageSource: './img/default.png', joinValue: false, name: '', postInfo: '', title: '', } } handleName = (event) => { this.setState({name: event.target.value}); } handleEmail = (event) => { this.setState({email: event.target.value}); } handleContent = (event) => { this.setState({content: event.target.value}); } handleGroupSize = (event) => { this.setState({groupSize: event.target.value}); } handlePostInfo = (event) => { this.setState({postInfo: event.target.value}); } handleTitle = (event) => { this.setState({title: event.target.value}); } handleSubmit = () => { let postRef = firebase.database().ref('posts') postRef.push(this.state) } render() { const { name, email, content, title, postInfo } = this.state; const isEnabled = email.length > 0 && name.length > 0 && content.length > 0 && title.length > 0 && postInfo.length > 0; return (
